job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>This is an amazing opportunity to join a rapidly growing company that offers great benefits and growth opportunities.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Minimum Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>3+ years of experience developing and applying deep&nbsp;learning&nbsp;models </li><li>1+ year programming experience with Python and Python&nbsp;machine&nbsp;learning&nbsp;frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Sklearn, NLTK)&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Nice If You Have:</strong></p><ul><li>Graduate degree or publication record in a relevant field&nbsp;</li><li>Strong knowledge of CS fundamentals (compilation, assembly / low-level programming, operating systems, etc.)</li><li>Familiarity with common approaches in NLP (word embeddings, language models, sequence-to-sequence models, syntax parsing, etc.)</li><li>Applied research experience</li></ul><p><strong>Clearance / US Citizen:</strong></p><ul><li>Active DoD Secret security clearance required&nbsp;</li></ul><p></p>
